amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund to allow for deficit-neutral legislation that would provide for an extension of the Medicare part D enrollment period.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3073 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 22. Record Vote Number: 48.

action.text: Amendment SA 3073 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S2152-2153, S2153-2154, S2177-2178; text: CR S2152) To establish a reserve fund to allow for deficit-neutral legislation that would provide for an extension of the Medicare part D enrollment period.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3073 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 22. Record Vote Number: 48.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3073 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 22. Record Vote Number: 48.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3073 proposed by Senator Grassley.
